name: Allergic Vampire
description:
IF GAME IS LAGGY CLICK "o" IN THE START SCREEN. Graphics will be worse but game should run smoother.

Made for Mini Jam 118

Theme: Vampires

Limitation: Blood is lethal

Gameplay and Code --- HmanHere

Art --- Bountyhat

Allergic Vampire is a short game where you play as a vampire trying to get his allergy medicine. There is one big problem though! You live at the top of a haunted house and the drug store is at the bottom. Scale to the bottom avoiding humans to make sure you don't accidentally eat them!
